Analyses for Data Science

When it comes to business decisions, humans and machines approach things very differently. One element of this is that machines have essentially perfect memory. You can give it to 'em once and they'll probably give it back to you exactly the same way later.

Ethics and Agency in Data Science

Data science can make you feel like a superhero who's here to save the world or at least your business's world. But an alarming amount of data work can also end up in court or on the wrong side of a protest so I want to talk about a few things that can help keep you, your company and your data science work on the up and up.

What is Data Science?

Back in the early 60's, Barbra Streisand sang, 'People who need people are the luckiest people in the world.' And really, the need for belonging, the need to connect, and the need to be valued are all fundamental human motivations. As it happens, working in data science can actually help fulfill some of these foundational needs.
